alert.note: Alert for Hill (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 22 at 5:27PM MDT until August 22 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Hill County in north central Montana... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 527 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Inverness, or 20 miles east of Chester, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gildford, Hingham, Rudyard and Kremlin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
